title: Epic 01.x: FlowBundle Runtime Packaging
description: Remove executor() boilerplate by introducing FlowBundle abstraction that packages ValidatedIR + node resolver + entrypoint metadata

title: Define FlowBundle types in host-inproc
description: Blocked: crates/host-inproc/src/lib.rs reserved by worker-flowbundle-types. Awaiting release/coordination.

title: Expose NodeHandler and handler method in kernel-exec
description: Make NodeHandler trait public and expose NodeRegistry::handler method so host-inproc can implement NodeResolver. Prerequisite for FlowBundle types.

title: Extend dag-macros with _register() helpers and workflow_bundle!
Migrate examples s1_echo, s2_site, s3_branching to workflow_bundle!
Migrate examples s4_preflight, s5_unsupported_surface, s6_spill to workflow_bundle!
Refactor CLI to consume FlowBundle instead of executor()+constants
Fix Epic 01.x test failures and wire allowlist enforcement
description: Address all gaps identified in holistic review: test compilation failures, allowlist enforcement not wired up, missing unit tests, and work-log entry.

title: Fix remaining test failures: kernel-plan dep and s6_spill field
description: Add kernel-exec dev-dep to kernel-plan and fix s6_spill BatchRequest lf_burst_index field

title: Validate all examples work correctly post-migration
description: Run and validate each example (s1-s6) works as expected after FlowBundle migration. Fix any issues.

title: Epic 02.1: kernel-exec Wasm Readiness
description: Make kernel-exec build under wasm32-unknown-unknown without regressing native performance. Feature-gate OS-only dependencies.

title: Add wasm feature flag and configure conditional dependencies
Feature-gate BlobSpill filesystem code and add wasm error handling
Verify wasm compilation and native tests
description: Blocked on workspace check: host-web-axum missing ExecutionError::UnsupportedSpill match arm (crates/host-web-axum/src/lib.rs:605). Awaiting coordinator direction.

title: Epic 02.2: host-workers Cloudflare Workers Adapter
description: Create host-workers crate that maps HTTP Request to Invocation, executes via HostRuntime with wasm-ready kernel-exec, and returns Response with streaming and error envelope parity.

title: Create host-workers crate scaffold and workspace config
Verify wasm compilation and add test configuration
description: Resolved mio by moving tokio out of host-inproc deps and making kernel-exec wasm-specific. wasm check now fails in host-workers/src/lib.rs (unsafe extern, missing event import, Unpin in select, temp borrow). Need code changes in that file; not in assigned scope and not reserved.
